descriptionHtml:
*Now includes guide book and correct head textures*

I like to RP when playing Skyrim and have always found the inns to be a bit, underwhelming. This mod introduces a new inn to Skyrim, just off of the turning to Whiterun. 

Inside you will find the most well stocked general goods store in all of Skyrim, guaranteed! As well as a luxury hot-spring pool, a large open plan drinking hall and a comprehensive kitchen. 

Martyn and Esa welcome you to their newly opened luxury inn.

Great video made by svaalbard

[youtube]VD394sgmcdg[/youtube]

Mod contains:
Main drinking hall (with merchant)
Kitchen (with merchant)
Pool room
Storage room
Owners bedroom
Well stocked shop (with merchant)
7 bedrooms (2 rentable)
Beer garden
Stolen goods fence
25 new npcs
Fully Navmeshed (follower friendly) 


Plans for the future
Make the inn player ownable (with quests)

REQUIRED MODS:
Apachii\'s Hair

RECOMMENDED MODS:	
Perseids Inns and Taverns - Realistic Room Rental Enhanced by perseid9	
Realistic Needs and Diseases by perseid9	
Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival by Chesko

*please note i have made the npcs essential as i will be using most of them for future quests, sorry*

This is my first mod so please be gentle :P I welcome any suggestions/constructive comments
author: whadafool
